successes.title: Hyper Light Drifter
successes.description: Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with unknown dangers and lost technologies. Inspired by nightmares and dreams alike.

Pledges.description: EARLY BACKER COPY - - -
A DRM-free digital copy of Hyper Light Drifter is yours to play (or make distressing faces at).

FULL PACKAGE COPY - - - 
DRM-free copy of the game plus a PDF instruction booklet (crafted from endlessly refracted light) and a set of hi-res Backer-only wallpapers to stare at in a dreamy fashion.
FULL PACKAGE + BONUS ---Receive all items from the previous tier, plus an alternate Golden Companion Sprite and a flashy Golden secondary weapon. These will be included in all tiers above as well.

EARLY BETA ACCESS - - - 
Help improve the game by breaking it, thus making it stronger and rich with scars. You'll also be thanked by name in the credits. All previous rewards included.

DIGITAL COMPANION ART BOOK + OST - - - 
Receive a glimmering digital copy of the soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace, and a book that includes concept art, game assets, story revelations, behind the scenes notes and silly drawings chiseled into PDF format and sent your way, plus another copy (key or download) of the game. All previous rewards included.

SPECIAL T-SHIRT + GAME --- This tier ONLY! Receive a T-Shirt with design by Casey Hunt (see Update #9) plus a copy of the game! All previous rewards included. All awards above this price do not auto-receive T-shirt; it will be available as a stand-alone purchase after the Kickstarter.

SPECIAL T-SHIRT + GAME #2 --- This tier ONLY! Receive a T-Shirt with design by Casey Hunt (see Update #9) plus a copy of the game! All previous rewards included. All awards above this price do not auto-receive T-shirt; it will be available as a stand-alone purchase after the Kickstarter.

PHYSICAL BOX AND MANUAL --- This includes the physical box for the game, physical manual, a digital copy of the game (platform of your choice, bonus content included), digital download of the OST (on release), digital copy of the Companion Art Book, and Hi Res Wallpapers. A tier packed heart and soul.

ALTERNATE DRIFTER + EXTRA KEYS- - - 
Receive a specialized alternate character sprite to play in-game, plus an extra key for a friend (3 keys in total), and a second set of wallpapers. All previous rewards included.

RESPLENDANT PRINT - - - 
A hand signed limited edition archival poster shipped directly to your location with a crudely fashioned thank you note on back. All previous rewards included.
PRINTED COMPANION ART BOOK

A softcover, full-color printed version of the book, which contains all production art work, unseen concepts and unused pixel work, back story, characters and lore not explored in-game, artist commissioned side stories and character pinups as well as a collection of fan art. Includes all previous digital rewards. (Check the rewards section and reference sheet for details.) PRINTED book NOT included automatically in higher tiers.

RESPLENDANT PRINT PART 2 ---
The same as the print reward before, but open for international shipping and additional cost for labor intensive shipping and packing.
RESPLENDENT PRINT PART 3 --- One more chance to grab a print. All previous rewards included.

LUXURIANT PRINT --- LAST chance for a print. An ALTERNATE hand signed limited edition archival poster shipped directly to your location with a crudely fashioned thank you note on back. All previous rewards included.

THANK-YOU SCROLL --- Your name will be scrawled in neon upon a massive tablet of pixel stone, set in a special area of the game. All rewards - excluding the t-shirt, print, immortal sprite and enemy design - included.
UNIQUE COMPANION SPRITE --- Receive an alternate Sprite Companion, functionally the same, but with a trim new format and color scheme. All previous rewards - excluding the print - included.
LIMITED PRINTED PACKAGE --- This is a special one-of-a-kind tier; you receive a special limited edition printed copy of the book, the physical box + manual, and 3 keys for the game.

CREATE A CHALLENGE --- Help us develop a unique Challenge Quest for the upcoming Challenge Mode. You'll work with us on a custom Quest that all players will have access to. All previous rewards - excluding the t-shirt, Thank-You Scroll and resplendent print - included.

IMMORTAL SPRITE - - - 
Submit your name to be transformed into a custom rune to appear in-game. Also receive a drawing upon note paper, adorned with neon colors and a sweet whispered message, much akin to the ones you cherished in Junior High. (Oh the tragic memories!) All previous rewards - excluding the print - included.

DESIGN A DASTARDLY ENEMY - - - 
Work with us to create a custom enemy: influence the look, behavior and place of origin. All rewards, excluding the print and immortal sprite, included.

CUSTOM WORK --- You'll receive a one-of-a-kind hand drawn piece on archival paper featuring the main character, crafted ever so gently by Heart Machine, plus 6 keys for the game, the physical box and manual, all wallpapers, the Companion Art Book, and a digital copy of the OST.
